detectors.description:
Reentrancy in GasToken2.free(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- destroyChildren(value) ()
		- mk_contract_address(this,i).call() ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- s_balances[msg.sender] = from_balance - value ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [GasToken2.free(uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [destroyChildren(value)]()
		- [mk_contract_address(this,i).call()]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [s_balances[msg.sender] = from_balance - value]()
